description.raw: This PR merges in the install / getting started docs from the previously separate docs repository "dedalus-project/dedalus-docs."  This will hopefully make it easier to keep the install script and install docs in sync in the future, and make it substantially easier to incorporate the code docstrings in the same sphinx documentation as the install instructions.
description.html: This PR merges in the install / getting started docs from the previously separate docs repository "dedalus-project/dedalus-docs." This will hopefully make it easier to keep the install script and install docs in sync in the future, and make it substantially easier to incorporate the code docstrings in the same sphinx documentation as the install instructions.
